name: EcoHome Panel Upgrade Rebate
description: $1,000 rebate for electrical panel upgrade as add-on to other EcoHome rebate
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy offers rebates for electrical panel upgrades when done alongside other EcoHome electrification projects, helping homes support additional electric appliances.
whatTheyOffer:
- $1,000 rebate for panel upgrade
- Must be add-on to other EcoHome rebate
- Supports home electrification
- Increased electrical capacity
- Enables additional electric appliances
- Future-proofs home electrical system
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must be claiming another EcoHome rebate
3. Include panel upgrade in project scope
4. Have professionally installed within 120 days
5. Apply as add-on with primary rebate
6. Submit documentation for panel upgrade
